text: Summer Place Wanted () is a 1957 Swedish comedy movie directed by Hasse Ekman and starring Eva Dahlbeck, Bibi Andersson, Sigge Fürst, Gunnar Björnstrand, Birgitte Reimer, Alf Kjellin. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 comedy movies Category:Swedish comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Hasse Ekman
title: Summer Place Wanted
